data.oai_dc:dc: zipped vcf of all bialleleic SNPs called in 10 Aquilegia species plus Semiaquilegia.Species are referred to by short names as follows:species name.in.vcf geographyAquilegia_aurea IIUF europeAquilegia_barnebyi IIUC north_americaAquilegia_chrysantha IIWY north_americaAquilegia_japonica IIWU asiaAquilegia_formosa IIWT north_americaAquilegia_longissima IIWX north_americaAquilegia_oxysepala IIWW asiaAquilegia_vulgaris IIUH europeAquilegia_pubescens D14R north_americaAquilegia_sibirica IIUI asiaSemiaquilegia SRR4 asia
